product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 2.5 Knife - Special Buy
long_description: The compact Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 2.5 Knife features a tough 3mm-thick (0.12 in.) blade that will stand up to rugged use on camping trips. The titanium-coated, hardened 440C steel blade is rust resistant, and it holds a sharp edge. Serrations on the blade come in handy when you're cutting rope. 2.5 in. long blade is perfect for small jobs and emergency use. Bead-blasted texture on the high-density thermoplastic rubber handle offers a secure grip in all weather conditions. Slotted handle extension lets you add a lanyard or other attachment (not included). Special buy.
short_description: The compact Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 2.5 Knife features a tough 3mm-thick (0.12 in.) blade that will stand up to rugged use on camping trips.
